Private Sub pnlSHAREDMETHOD_PositionChanged() pnlSHAREDMETHOD.SavePosition End Sub Private Sub cmdSHAREDMETHODPrn_Click() on error resume next Dim jset As object 'MTZ_JSetup.Customizer Set jset = CreateObject("MTZ_JSetup.Customizer") jset.Preview gridSHAREDMETHOD,"Методы и процедуры" Set jset = Nothing End Sub
Private Sub cmdSHAREDMETHODFnd_Click() on error resume next fndSHAREDMETHOD.ShowForm End Sub Private Sub cmdSHAREDMETHODRun_Click() on error resume next gridSHAREDMETHOD_DblClick End Sub Private Sub pnlSHAREDMETHOD_MasterResize(ByVal Top As Single, ByVal Left As Single, ByVal Width As Single, ByVal Height As Single) on error resume next treeSHAREDMETHOD.Left = Left treeSHAREDMETHOD.Top = Top + 25 * Screen.TwipsPerPixelY treeSHAREDMETHOD.Width = Width treeSHAREDMETHOD.Height = Height- 25 * Screen.TwipsPerPixelY End Sub Private Sub pnlSHAREDMETHOD_SlaveResize(ByVal Top As Single, ByVal Left As Single, ByVal Width As Single, ByVal Height As Single) on error resume next gridSHAREDMETHOD.Left = Left gridSHAREDMETHOD.Top = Top + 25 * Screen.TwipsPerPixelY gridSHAREDMETHOD.Width = Width gridSHAREDMETHOD.Height = Height- 25 * Screen.TwipsPerPixelY cmdSHAREDMETHODAdd.Left = Left +5 *Screen.TwipsPerPixelX cmdSHAREDMETHODEdit.Left = Left +30* Screen.TwipsPerPixelX cmdSHAREDMETHODDel.Left = Left+55* Screen.TwipsPerPixelX cmdSHAREDMETHODRef.Left = Left+80* Screen.TwipsPerPixelX cmdSHAREDMETHODPrn.Left = Left+105* Screen.TwipsPerPixelX cmdSHAREDMETHODCfg.Left = Left+130* Screen.TwipsPerPixelX cmdSHAREDMETHODFnd.Left = Left+155* Screen.TwipsPerPixelX cmdSHAREDMETHODRun.Left = Left+180* Screen.TwipsPerPixelX cmdSHAREDMETHODAcc.Left = Left+205* Screen.TwipsPerPixelX End Sub private sub cmdSHAREDMETHODDel_Click() on error resume next gridSHAREDMETHOD.Delete End Sub
'Признак правильности заполнения 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'Returns: ' Boolean, семантика результата: ' true - ' false - 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as BooLEAN ' variable = me.IsOK() Public Function IsOK() as BooLEAN IsOK=TRUE End Function private sub cmdSHAREDMETHODEdit_Click() on error resume next If gridSHAREDMETHOD.ItemCount = 0 Then Exit Sub If gridSHAREDMETHOD.Row > 0 Then If gridSHAREDMETHOD.RowIndex ( gridSHAREDMETHOD.Row) > 0 Then Dim u As Object Dim bm bm = gridSHAREDMETHOD.RowBookmark(gridSHAREDMETHOD.RowIndex(gridSHAREDMETHOD.Row)) Set u = Item.FindRowObject(Right(bm, len(bm)-38), Left(bm, 38)) Dim frm As Form Set frm = FormByName(TypeName(u),"") Set frm.Item = u again: frm.NotFirstTime = False frm.OnInit frm.Show vbModal If frm.OK Then on error goto bye u.save u.Brief true if err.number <>0 then bye: msgbox err.description,vbokonly+vbExclamation,"Изменение" on error resume next goto again end if on error resume next gridSHAREDMETHOD.RefreshRowBookmark bm Else u.Refresh End If Set frm = Nothing End If End If End Sub
private sub cmdSHAREDMETHODAdd_Click() on error resume next Dim p As Object, ID As String, struct As String, u As Object If treeSHAREDMETHOD.SelectedItem Is Nothing Then Exit Sub If treeSHAREDMETHOD.SelectedItem.Tag = "Row" Then On Error Resume Next ID = Mid(treeSHAREDMETHOD.SelectedItem.key, 39, 38) struct = treeSHAREDMETHOD.SelectedItem.parent.tag Set p = Item.FindRowObject(struct, ID) If Item.itemcollection(p, TypeName(p)) Is Nothing Then Set u = p.Parent.Add Else Set u = Item.itemcollection(p, TypeName(p)).Add End If
Set p = Nothing ElseIf treeSHAREDMETHOD.SelectedItem.Tag <> "object" Then If treeSHAREDMETHOD.SelectedItem.Parent.Tag = "Row" Then ID = Mid(treeSHAREDMETHOD.SelectedItem.Parent.key, 39, 38) struct = treeSHAREDMETHOD.SelectedItem.parent.parent.tag Set p = Item.FindRowObject(struct, ID) Set u = Item.itemcollection(p, treeSHAREDMETHOD.SelectedItem.Tag).Add End If If treeSHAREDMETHOD.SelectedItem.Parent.Tag = "object" Then ID = Mid(treeSHAREDMETHOD.SelectedItem.Parent.key, 39, 38) Set p = Item.Manager.GetInstanceObject(ID) Set u = Item.itemcollection(p, treeSHAREDMETHOD.SelectedItem.Tag).Add End If End If Set p = Nothing If u Is Nothing Then Exit Sub Dim frm As Form Set frm = FormByName(TypeName(u),"")
if TypeName(u)="PARAMETERS" then call GetNumValue(u, "sequence", "{E7F3EE01-4EC4-41D2-8657-BA22089DE0E5}",Now,"PARAMETER%P", "")
end if Set frm.Item = u again: frm.NotFirstTime = False frm.OnInit frm.Show vbModal If frm.OK Then err.clear u.save if err.number <>0 then msgbox err.description,vbokonly+vbExclamation,"Создание" goto again end if gridSHAREDMETHOD.ItemCount = u.Parent.Count gridSHAREDMETHOD.Refresh gridSHAREDMETHOD.RefreshGroups gridSHAREDMETHOD.RefreshSort Dim tid As String Dim key As String on error resume next Dim rnode As MSComctlLib.Node Set rnode = treeSHAREDMETHOD.SelectedItem If rnode.Tag = "Row" Then Set rnode = rnode.parent End If While rnode.Children > 0 treeSHAREDMETHOD.Nodes.Remove rnode.Child.Key Wend tid = CreateGUID2() treeSHAREDMETHOD.Nodes.Add(rnode.Key, 4, tid, "Expanding...").Tag = "ToDelete" treeSHAREDMETHOD_Expand treeSHAREDMETHOD.Nodes.Item(rnode.Key) Else u.Parent.Delete u.ID u.Parent.Remove u.ID End If Set frm = Nothing End Sub
Private Sub cmdSHAREDMETHODCfg_Click() on error resume next Dim rnode As MSComctlLib.Node Set rnode = treeSHAREDMETHOD.SelectedItem if rnode.tag = "object" then exit sub If rnode.Tag = "Row" Then Set rnode = rnode.parent End If Dim jset As object 'MTZ_JSetup.Customizer Set jset = CreateObject("MTZ_JSetup.Customizer") jset.ShowSumary gridSHAREDMETHOD,"gridSHAREDMETHOD" & rnode.tag Set jset = Nothing End Sub
Private Sub treeSHAREDMETHOD_Expand(ByVal Node As MSComctlLib.Node) If Node.Child.Tag = "ToDelete" Then parentform.mousepointer = vbHourglass treeSHAREDMETHOD.Nodes.Remove Node.Child.Index item.Expand treeSHAREDMETHOD, Node.Key, "" parentform.mousepointer = vbNormal End If set treeSHAREDMETHOD.SelectedItem = Node treeSHAREDMETHOD_NodeClick Node End Sub
Private Sub treeSHAREDMETHOD_Collapse(ByVal Node As MSComctlLib.Node) set treeSHAREDMETHOD.SelectedItem = Node treeSHAREDMETHOD_NodeClick Node End Sub
Private Sub treeSHAREDMETHOD_NodeClick(ByVal Node As MSComctlLib.Node) Dim p As Object, ID As String, struct As String If Node.Tag = "Row" Then On Error Resume Next ID = Mid(Node.Key, 39, 38) struct = Node.parent.tag Set p = Item.FindRowObject(struct, ID) On Error Resume Next Item.itemcollection(p.parent.parent, TypeName(p)).preparegrid gridSHAREDMETHOD LoadGridLayout gridSHAREDMETHOD,gridSHAREDMETHOD.name & node.parent.tag Set fndSHAREDMETHOD = Nothing Set fndSHAREDMETHOD = CreateObject("MTZ_JSetup.GridFinder") fndSHAREDMETHOD.Init gridSHAREDMETHOD ElseIf Node.Tag <> "object" Then If Node.Parent is nothing Then Item.itemcollection(item, Node.Tag).preparegrid gridSHAREDMETHOD LoadGridLayout gridSHAREDMETHOD,gridSHAREDMETHOD.name & node.tag else If Node.Parent.Tag = "Row" Then ID = Mid(Node.Parent.Key, 39, 38) struct = Node.Parent.parent.tag Set p = Item.FindRowObject(struct, ID) Item.itemcollection(p, Node.Tag).preparegrid gridSHAREDMETHOD LoadGridLayout gridSHAREDMETHOD,gridSHAREDMETHOD.name & node.tag End If If Node.Parent.Tag = "object" Then ID = Mid(Node.Parent.Key, 39, 38) Set p = Item.Manager.GetInstanceObject(ID) Item.itemcollection(p, Node.Tag).preparegrid gridSHAREDMETHOD LoadGridLayout gridSHAREDMETHOD,gridSHAREDMETHOD.name & Node.Tag End If End If End If End Sub Private Sub cmdTSHAREDMETHODRef_Click() on error resume next treeSHAREDMETHOD.Nodes.Clear Item.FillTree treeSHAREDMETHOD, "", "", "SHAREDMETHOD" gridSHAREDMETHOD.columns.clear gridSHAREDMETHOD.itemcount=0 End Sub Private Sub cmdSHAREDMETHODRef_Click() on error resume next treeSHAREDMETHOD_NodeClick treeSHAREDMETHOD.SelectedItem End Sub Private Sub cmdSHAREDMETHODAcc_Click() on error resume next If gridSHAREDMETHOD.ItemCount = 0 Then Exit Sub If gridSHAREDMETHOD.Row > 0 Then If gridSHAREDMETHOD.RowIndex ( gridSHAREDMETHOD.Row) > 0 Then Dim u As Object Dim bm bm = gridSHAREDMETHOD.RowBookmark(gridSHAREDMETHOD.RowIndex(gridSHAREDMETHOD.Row)) Set u = Item.FindRowObject(Right(bm, len(bm)-38), Left(bm, 38)) item.application.manager.ShowSecurityDialog u End If End If End Sub Private Sub gridSHAREDMETHOD_UnboundReadData(ByVal RowIndex As Long, ByVal Bookmark As Variant, ByVal Values As GridEX20.JSRowData) on error resume next Dim p As Object, ID As String, struct As String If treeSHAREDMETHOD.SelectedItem Is Nothing Then Exit Sub If treeSHAREDMETHOD.SelectedItem.Tag = "Row" Then On Error Resume Next ID = Mid(treeSHAREDMETHOD.SelectedItem.Key, 39, 38) struct = treeSHAREDMETHOD.SelectedItem.parent.Tag Set p = Item.FindRowObject(struct, ID) Item.itemcollection(p.parent.parent, TypeName(p)).LoadRow gridSHAREDMETHOD, RowIndex, Bookmark, Values Set p = Nothing elseIf treeSHAREDMETHOD.SelectedItem.Tag <> "object" Then If treeSHAREDMETHOD.SelectedItem.Parent is nothing Then Item.itemcollection(item, treeSHAREDMETHOD.SelectedItem.Tag).LoadRow gridSHAREDMETHOD, RowIndex, Bookmark, Values else If treeSHAREDMETHOD.SelectedItem.Parent.Tag = "Row" Then ID = Mid(treeSHAREDMETHOD.SelectedItem.Parent.Key, 39, 38) struct = treeSHAREDMETHOD.SelectedItem.parent.parent.tag Set p = Item.FindRowObject(struct, ID) Item.itemcollection(p, treeSHAREDMETHOD.SelectedItem.Tag).LoadRow gridSHAREDMETHOD, RowIndex, Bookmark, Values End If If treeSHAREDMETHOD.SelectedItem.Parent.Tag = "object" Then ID = Mid(treeSHAREDMETHOD.SelectedItem.Parent.Key, 39, 38) Set p = Item.Manager.GetInstanceObject(ID) Item.itemcollection(p, treeSHAREDMETHOD.SelectedItem.Tag).LoadRow gridSHAREDMETHOD, RowIndex, Bookmark, Values End If End If End If End Sub Private Sub gridSHAREDMETHOD_BeforeDeleteEX(ByVal RowIndex As Long, ByVal Bookmark As Variant, ByVal Cancel As GridEX20.JSRetBoolean) If gridSHAREDMETHOD.ItemCount = 0 Then Exit Sub Dim u As Object Set u = Item.FindRowObject(Right(Bookmark,len(Bookmark)- 38), Left(Bookmark, 38)) If Not u Is Nothing Then on error resume next If MsgBox("Удалить элемент" & vbCrLf & u.Brief & vbCrLf & "?", vbYesNo + vbQuestion, "Внимание") = vbYes Then on error goto bye u.Parent.Delete u.ID on error resume next Dim rnode As MSComctlLib.Node, tid as string Set rnode = treeSHAREDMETHOD.SelectedItem If rnode.Tag = "Row" Then Set rnode = rnode.parent End If While rnode.Children > 0 treeSHAREDMETHOD.Nodes.Remove rnode.Child.Key Wend tid = CreateGUID2() treeSHAREDMETHOD.Nodes.Add(rnode.Key, 4, tid, "Expanding...").Tag = "ToDelete" treeSHAREDMETHOD_Expand treeSHAREDMETHOD.Nodes.Item(rnode.Key) Else Cancel = True End If End If Exit Sub bye: Cancel = True MsgBox Err.Description, vbOKOnly + vbExclamation, "Удаление" End Sub
Private Sub gridSHAREDMETHOD_DblClick() on error resume next If gridSHAREDMETHOD.ItemCount = 0 Then Exit Sub If gridSHAREDMETHOD.Row > 0 Then If gridSHAREDMETHOD.RowIndex ( gridSHAREDMETHOD.Row) > 0 Then Dim u As Object Dim bm bm = gridSHAREDMETHOD.RowBookmark(gridSHAREDMETHOD.RowIndex(gridSHAREDMETHOD.Row)) Set u = Item.FindRowObject(Right(bm, len(bm)-38), Left(bm, 38)) Dim frm As Form Set frm = FormByName(TypeName(u),"") Set frm.Item = u again: frm.NotFirstTime = False frm.OnInit frm.Show vbModal If frm.OK Then on error goto bye u.save u.Brief true bye: if err.number <>0 then msgbox err.description,vbokonly+vbExclamation,"Изменение" on error resume next goto again end if on error resume next gridSHAREDMETHOD.RefreshRowBookmark bm Else u.Refresh End If Set frm = Nothing End If End If End Sub

38), Left(bm, 38)) SaveToBuffer u End If End If End Sub Private Sub mnuSHAREDMETHODCUT_Click() On Error Resume Next If gridSHAREDMETHOD.ItemCount = 0 Then Exit Sub If gridSHAREDMETHOD.Row > 0 Then If gridSHAREDMETHOD.RowIndex(gridSHAREDMETHOD.Row) > 0 Then Dim u As Object Dim bm bm = gridSHAREDMETHOD.RowBookmark(gridSHAREDMETHOD.RowIndex(gridSHAREDMETHOD.Row)) Set u = item.FindRowObject(Right(bm, Len(bm) - 38), Left(bm, 38)) SaveToBuffer u SET BM = u.parent u.parent.Delete u.ID gridSHAREDMETHOD.ITEMCOUNT = BM.COUNT End If End If End Sub private sub mnuSHAREDMETHODPASTE_Click() on error resume next Dim p As Object, ID As String, struct As String, u As Object If treeSHAREDMETHOD.SelectedItem Is Nothing Then Exit Sub If treeSHAREDMETHOD.SelectedItem.Tag = "Row" Then On Error Resume Next ID = Mid(treeSHAREDMETHOD.SelectedItem.key, 39, 38) struct = treeSHAREDMETHOD.SelectedItem.parent.tag Set p = Item.FindRowObject(struct, ID) If Item.itemcollection(p, TypeName(p)) Is Nothing Then Set u = p.Parent.Add Else Set u = Item.itemcollection(p, TypeName(p)).Add End If
Set p = Nothing ElseIf treeSHAREDMETHOD.SelectedItem.Tag <> "object" Then If treeSHAREDMETHOD.SelectedItem.Parent.Tag = "Row" Then ID = Mid(treeSHAREDMETHOD.SelectedItem.Parent.key, 39, 38) struct = treeSHAREDMETHOD.SelectedItem.parent.parent.tag Set p = Item.FindRowObject(struct, ID) Set u = Item.itemcollection(p, treeSHAREDMETHOD.SelectedItem.Tag).Add End If If treeSHAREDMETHOD.SelectedItem.Parent.Tag = "object" Then ID = Mid(treeSHAREDMETHOD.SelectedItem.Parent.key, 39, 38) Set p = Item.Manager.GetInstanceObject(ID) Set u = Item.itemcollection(p, treeSHAREDMETHOD.SelectedItem.Tag).Add End If End If Set p = Nothing If u Is Nothing Then Exit Sub if getFrombuffer(u) then gridSHAREDMETHOD.ItemCount = u.Parent.Count gridSHAREDMETHOD.Refresh gridSHAREDMETHOD.RefreshGroups gridSHAREDMETHOD.RefreshSort Dim tid As String Dim key As String on error resume next Dim rnode As MSComctlLib.Node Set rnode = treeSHAREDMETHOD.SelectedItem If rnode.Tag = "Row" Then Set rnode = rnode.parent End If While rnode.Children > 0 treeSHAREDMETHOD.Nodes.Remove rnode.Child.Key Wend tid = CreateGUID2() treeSHAREDMETHOD.Nodes.Add(rnode.Key, 4, tid, "Expanding...").Tag = "ToDelete" treeSHAREDMETHOD_Expand treeSHAREDMETHOD.Nodes.Item(rnode.Key) Else u.Parent.Remove u.ID End If End Sub
Private Sub mnuSHAREDMETHODCHANGE_Click() On Error Resume Next If gridSHAREDMETHOD.ItemCount = 0 Then Exit Sub If gridSHAREDMETHOD.Row > 0 Then If gridSHAREDMETHOD.RowIndex(gridSHAREDMETHOD.Row) > 0 Then Dim u As Object Dim bm bm = gridSHAREDMETHOD.RowBookmark(gridSHAREDMETHOD.RowIndex(gridSHAREDMETHOD.Row)) Set u = item.FindRowObject(Right(bm, Len(bm) - 38), Left(bm, 38)) If GetFromBuffer(u) Then gridSHAREDMETHOD.ItemCount = u.parent.Count gridSHAREDMETHOD.RefreshRowIndex gridSHAREDMETHOD.RowIndex(gridSHAREDMETHOD.Row) End If End If End If End Sub Private Sub mnuSHAREDMETHODCLEAN_Click() item.Manager.ClearBuffer " & p.name & " End Sub private sub mnuSHAREDMETHODPrn_click() menuActionSHAREDMETHOD ="PRN" menuTimerSHAREDMETHOD.enabled = true end sub private sub mnuSHAREDMETHODCfg_click() menuActionSHAREDMETHOD ="CFG" menuTimerSHAREDMETHOD.enabled = true end sub private sub mnuSHAREDMETHODFind_click() menuActionSHAREDMETHOD ="FND" menuTimerSHAREDMETHOD.enabled = true end sub private sub mnuSHAREDMETHODAcc_click() menuActionSHAREDMETHOD ="ACC" menuTimerSHAREDMETHOD.enabled = true end sub private sub menuTimerSHAREDMETHOD_timer() menuTimerSHAREDMETHOD.enabled = false if menuActionSHAREDMETHOD ="ADD" then cmdSHAREDMETHODADD_CLick if menuActionSHAREDMETHOD ="EDIT" then cmdSHAREDMETHODEDIT_CLick if menuActionSHAREDMETHOD ="DEL" then cmdSHAREDMETHODDEL_CLick if menuActionSHAREDMETHOD ="RUN" then cmdSHAREDMETHODRUN_CLick if menuActionSHAREDMETHOD ="REF" then cmdSHAREDMETHODREF_CLick if menuActionSHAREDMETHOD ="PRN" then cmdSHAREDMETHODPRN_CLick if menuActionSHAREDMETHOD ="CFG" then cmdSHAREDMETHODCFG_CLick if menuActionSHAREDMETHOD ="FND" then cmdSHAREDMETHODFND_CLick if menuActionSHAREDMETHOD ="ACC" then cmdSHAREDMETHODACC_CLick menuActionSHAREDMETHOD ="" end sub

On Error Resume Next

'Создание отчета из разных карточек '{5B8FB7B9-D8B1-4CA0-90AF-55F83D1A6E5D} private sub Run_VBMakeReport ( ReportType as variant , optional RowItem as object ) On error resume next
On error goto bye Dim ID As String Dim Obj As Object 'ID = CreateGUID2 'Call RowItem.Application.Manager.NewInstance(ID, "VRRPT", "Отчет " & Date) 'Set RowItem.Report = RowItem.Application.Manager.GetInstanceObject(ID) If RowItem.Report.VRRPT_MAIN.Count = 0 Then Set Obj = RowItem.Report.VRRPT_MAIN.Add Else Set Obj = RowItem.Report.VRRPT_MAIN.Item(1) End If
Set Obj.Author = RowItem.Application.FindRowObject("Users", Item.Application.MTZSession.GetSessionUserID()) Obj.TheDate = Date
If ReportType = "CLNT" Then Set Obj.Client = RowItem.Application End If If ReportType = "PRJ" Then Set Obj.Project = RowItem.Application End If If ReportType = "CONT" Then Set Obj.Contract = RowItem.Application End If If ReportType = "PERS" Then Set Obj.Person = RowItem.Application End If
Obj.Save RowItem.Save
Exit Sub bye: MsgBox Err.Description, vbOKOnly + vbCritical, "Создание отчета" end sub
' '{AA4085E6-745B-4A37-8EC4-65D99A653966} private sub Run_VBRemoveSymmetricObjRef ( ForwardFieldName as variant ,ObjTypeName as variant ,SymmetricPartName as variant ,SymmetricFieldName as variant , optional RowItem as object ) On error resume next
Dim OK As Boolean Dim ID As String Dim brief As String
On Error Resume Next ' On Error GoTo bye
Dim Obj As Object Dim part_col As Variant Dim part_item As Object Set Obj = CallByName(RowItem, ForwardFieldName, VbGet) Set part_col = CallByName(Obj, SymmetricPartName, VbGet, False) part_col.Filter = SymmetricFieldName + "='" + RowItem.Application.ID + "'" ' RowItem.Parent.Remove RowItem.ID Set part_item = part_col.Item(1) part_col.Delete part_item.ID Exit Sub bye: Resume
end sub
'Создать новую оплату из клиента '{42A1A436-8AA2-4F1F-999B-6680DFF514DE} private sub Run_VBNewPayIn ( optional RowItem as object ) On error resume next
On error goto bye Dim ID As String Dim Obj As Object ID = CreateGUID2 Call RowItem.Application.Manager.NewInstance(ID, "PEKP", "Платеж " & Date) Set RowItem.TheDocument = RowItem.Application.Manager.GetInstanceObject(ID)
If RowItem.TheDocument.PEKP_DEF.Count = 0 Then Set Obj = RowItem.TheDocument.PEKP_DEF.Add Else Set Obj = RowItem.TheDocument.PEKP_DEF.Item(1) End If
Set Obj.FromClient = RowItem.Application Obj.PLPDate = Date Obj.Save RowItem.Save
Exit Sub bye: MsgBox Err.Description, vbOKOnly + vbCritical, "Создание Платежа" end sub
'Для раздела, в котором есть поле - ссылка, создает/выбирает объект без открытия окна редактирования ссылки '{A2EEE876-54D8-4AED-B124-775F5DA2D911} private sub Run_VBAddObjByRef ( ObjTypeName as variant ,ForwardFieldName as variant ,SymmetricPartName as variant ,SymmetricFieldName as variant , optional RowItem as object ) On error resume next
Dim OK As Boolean Dim ID As String Dim brief As String Dim Mode As String Dim ResObject as Object On Error Resume Next Mode = Mid(TypeName(Me), InStr(TypeName(Me), "_") + 1)
' On Error GoTo bye If Len(Mode) = 0 Then OK = Item.Application.Manager.GetObjectListDialogEx(ID, brief, "", ObjTypeName) Else ID = CreateGUID2 If Len(ObjTypeName) = 0 Then Dim newObj As Object Set newObj = Item.Application.Manager.GetNewObject If Not (newObj Is Nothing) Then OK = True ID = newObj.ID End If Else OK = Item.Application.Manager.NewInstance(ID, ObjTypeName, "") End If Dim ref As Object, objGui As Object Set ref = Item.Application.Manager.GetInstanceObject(ID) If Not ref Is Nothing Then Set objGui = Item.Application.Manager.GetInstanceGUI(ID) If objGui Is Nothing Then Set ref = Nothing: Exit Sub objGui.Show "", ref, False Set objGui = Nothing Else OK = False End If End If Dim Obj As Object Set Obj = Item.Application.Manager.GetInstanceObject(ID) If Obj Is Nothing Then OK = False End If If OK Then Dim Coll as New Collection Dim part_col As Variant Dim part_item As Object CallByName RowItem, ForwardFieldName, VbSet, Obj Coll.Add TypeName(RowItem)+ ":" + RowItem.ID RowItem.Save If Len(SymmetricPartName) > 0 And Len(SymmetricFieldName) > 0 Then Set part_col = CallByName(Obj, SymmetricPartName, VbGet, True) Set part_item = part_col.Add CallByName part_item, SymmetricFieldName, VbSet, RowItem.Application part_item.Save Coll.Add SymmetricPartName + ":" + part_item.ID End If Call Item.Application.Manager.AddCustomObjects(Coll, Obj.ID) Else RowItem.Parent.Remove RowItem.ID End If Exit Sub bye: Resume end sub
' '{5B376AF5-339B-4365-BA80-785E28BCF4DA} private sub Run_VBUpdateSymmetricObjRef ( SymmetricFieldName as variant ,ForwardFieldName as variant ,SymmetricPartName as variant ,ObjTypeName as variant , optional RowItem as object ) On error resume next
end sub

On error goto bye Dim ID As String Dim Obj As Object ID = CreateGUID2 Call RowItem.Application.Manager.NewInstance(ID, "PEKO", "Оплата " & Date) Set RowItem.TheDocument = RowItem.Application.Manager.GetInstanceObject(ID)
If RowItem.TheDocument.PEKO_DEF.Count = 0 Then Set Obj = RowItem.TheDocument.PEKO_DEF.Add Else Set Obj = RowItem.TheDocument.PEKO_DEF.Item(1) End If
Set Obj.ToClient = RowItem.Application Obj.PLPDate = Date Obj.Save RowItem.Save
Exit Sub bye: MsgBox Err.Description, vbOKOnly + vbCritical, "Создание Платежа" end sub
'открытие карточки по идентификатору '{94E8F6DB-106A-44DC-9483-86C801798FF0} private sub Run_VBOpenRef ( StartMode as variant ,ID as variant , optional RowItem as object ) On error resume next
on error resume next If ID <> "" Then Dim Obj As Object Set Obj = item.Manager.GetInstanceObject(ID) If Not Obj Is Nothing Then Dim objGui As Object Set objGui = item.Manager.GetInstanceGUI(Obj.ID) If objGui Is Nothing Then Exit Sub
If StartMode = "AUTO" Then StartMode = "" dim i as long For i = 100 To 0 Step -10 If Obj.MTZSession.CheckRight(Obj.SecureStyleid, Obj.TypeName & ":" & "M" & i) Then StartMode = "M" & i Exit For End If Next End If
objGui.Show StartMode & "", Obj Set objGui = Nothing End If End If
end sub

'Метод создает новый элемент в иерархии Имущественных Комплексов (приложение RealEstate) при создании нового элемента к нему линкуется объект ИК, форма которого и вызывается на редактирование '{477B8D25-4FF7-491A-A0B0-D3437EC16957} private sub Run_MakeNewFolderEC ( FolderID as variant , optional RowItem as object ) On error resume next
On Error GoTo bye Dim ID As String Dim Obj As Object ' EstComplex.Application ' Object Dim GObj As Object Dim fold As Object 'EstCatalog.Application ' Object
ID = CreateGUID2 Call RowItem.Application.Manager.NewInstance(ID, "EstComplex", RowItem.TheName & " " & Date) Set Obj = RowItem.Application.Manager.GetInstanceObject(ID) If Obj.EC_Def.Count = 0 Then With Obj.EC_Def.Add .TheName = RowItem.TheName End With Else Obj.EC_Def.Item(1).TheName = RowItem.TheName End If Obj.Save Set RowItem.LinkedEC = Obj RowItem.Save Set GObj = RowItem.Application.Manager.GetInstanceGUI(Obj.ID) GObj.Show "", Obj, True 'False Set Obj = RowItem.Application.Manager.GetInstanceObject(ID) RowItem.TheName = Obj.EC_Def.Item(1).TheName RowItem.Save Exit Sub bye: MsgBox Err.Description, vbOKOnly + vbCritical, "Создание ИК"
end sub

'Признак правильности заполнения 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'Returns: ' Boolean, семантика результата: ' true - ' false - 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as BooLEAN ' variable = me.IsOK() Public Function IsOK() as BooLEAN IsOK=TRUE End Function private sub cmdGENPACKAGEEdit_Click() on error resume next If gridGENPACKAGE.ItemCount = 0 Then Exit Sub If gridGENPACKAGE.Row > 0 Then If gridGENPACKAGE.RowIndex ( gridGENPACKAGE.Row) > 0 Then Dim u As Object Dim bm bm = gridGENPACKAGE.RowBookmark(gridGENPACKAGE.RowIndex(gridGENPACKAGE.Row)) Set u = Item.FindRowObject(Right(bm, len(bm)-38), Left(bm, 38)) Dim frm As Form Set frm = FormByName(TypeName(u),"") Set frm.Item = u again: frm.NotFirstTime = False frm.OnInit frm.Show vbModal If frm.OK Then on error goto bye u.save u.Brief true if err.number <>0 then bye: msgbox err.description,vbokonly+vbExclamation,"Изменение" on error resume next goto again end if on error resume next gridGENPACKAGE.RefreshRowBookmark bm Else u.Refresh End If Set frm = Nothing End If End If End Sub
private sub cmdGENPACKAGEAdd_Click() on error resume next Dim p As Object, ID As String, struct As String, u As Object If treeGENPACKAGE.SelectedItem Is Nothing Then Exit Sub If treeGENPACKAGE.SelectedItem.Tag = "Row" Then On Error Resume Next ID = Mid(treeGENPACKAGE.SelectedItem.key, 39, 38) struct = treeGENPACKAGE.SelectedItem.parent.tag Set p = Item.FindRowObject(struct, ID) If Item.itemcollection(p, TypeName(p)) Is Nothing Then Set u = p.Parent.Add Else Set u = Item.itemcollection(p, TypeName(p)).Add End If
Set p = Nothing ElseIf treeGENPACKAGE.SelectedItem.Tag <> "object" Then If treeGENPACKAGE.SelectedItem.Parent.Tag = "Row" Then ID = Mid(treeGENPACKAGE.SelectedItem.Parent.key, 39, 38) struct = treeGENPACKAGE.SelectedItem.parent.parent.tag Set p = Item.FindRowObject(struct, ID) Set u = Item.itemcollection(p, treeGENPACKAGE.SelectedItem.Tag).Add End If If treeGENPACKAGE.SelectedItem.Parent.Tag = "object" Then ID = Mid(treeGENPACKAGE.SelectedItem.Parent.key, 39, 38) Set p = Item.Manager.GetInstanceObject(ID) Set u = Item.itemcollection(p, treeGENPACKAGE.SelectedItem.Tag).Add End If End If Set p = Nothing If u Is Nothing Then Exit Sub Dim frm As Form Set frm = FormByName(TypeName(u),"")
Set frm.Item = u again: frm.NotFirstTime = False frm.OnInit frm.Show vbModal If frm.OK Then err.clear u.save if err.number <>0 then msgbox err.description,vbokonly+vbExclamation,"Создание" goto again end if gridGENPACKAGE.ItemCount = u.Parent.Count gridGENPACKAGE.Refresh gridGENPACKAGE.RefreshGroups gridGENPACKAGE.RefreshSort Dim tid As String Dim key As String on error resume next Dim rnode As MSComctlLib.Node Set rnode = treeGENPACKAGE.SelectedItem If rnode.Tag = "Row" Then Set rnode = rnode.parent End If While rnode.Children > 0 treeGENPACKAGE.Nodes.Remove rnode.Child.Key Wend tid = CreateGUID2() treeGENPACKAGE.Nodes.Add(rnode.Key, 4, tid, "Expanding...").Tag = "ToDelete" treeGENPACKAGE_Expand treeGENPACKAGE.Nodes.Item(rnode.Key) Else u.Parent.Delete u.ID u.Parent.Remove u.ID End If Set frm = Nothing End Sub

len(bm)-38), Left(bm, 38)) item.application.manager.ShowSecurityDialog u End If End If End Sub Private Sub gridGENPACKAGE_UnboundReadData(ByVal RowIndex As Long, ByVal Bookmark As Variant, ByVal Values As GridEX20.JSRowData) on error resume next Dim p As Object, ID As String, struct As String If treeGENPACKAGE.SelectedItem Is Nothing Then Exit Sub If treeGENPACKAGE.SelectedItem.Tag = "Row" Then On Error Resume Next ID = Mid(treeGENPACKAGE.SelectedItem.Key, 39, 38) struct = treeGENPACKAGE.SelectedItem.parent.Tag Set p = Item.FindRowObject(struct, ID) Item.itemcollection(p.parent.parent, TypeName(p)).LoadRow gridGENPACKAGE, RowIndex, Bookmark, Values Set p = Nothing elseIf treeGENPACKAGE.SelectedItem.Tag <> "object" Then If treeGENPACKAGE.SelectedItem.Parent is nothing Then Item.itemcollection(item, treeGENPACKAGE.SelectedItem.Tag).LoadRow gridGENPACKAGE, RowIndex, Bookmark, Values else If treeGENPACKAGE.SelectedItem.Parent.Tag = "Row" Then ID = Mid(treeGENPACKAGE.SelectedItem.Parent.Key, 39, 38) struct = treeGENPACKAGE.SelectedItem.parent.parent.tag Set p = Item.FindRowObject(struct, ID) Item.itemcollection(p, treeGENPACKAGE.SelectedItem.Tag).LoadRow gridGENPACKAGE, RowIndex, Bookmark, Values End If If treeGENPACKAGE.SelectedItem.Parent.Tag = "object" Then ID = Mid(treeGENPACKAGE.SelectedItem.Parent.Key, 39, 38) Set p = Item.Manager.GetInstanceObject(ID) Item.itemcollection(p, treeGENPACKAGE.SelectedItem.Tag).LoadRow gridGENPACKAGE, RowIndex, Bookmark, Values End If End If End If End Sub Private Sub gridGENPACKAGE_BeforeDeleteEX(ByVal RowIndex As Long, ByVal Bookmark As Variant, ByVal Cancel As GridEX20.JSRetBoolean) If gridGENPACKAGE.ItemCount = 0 Then Exit Sub Dim u As Object Set u = Item.FindRowObject(Right(Bookmark,len(Bookmark)- 38), Left(Bookmark, 38)) If Not u Is Nothing Then on error resume next If MsgBox("Удалить элемент" & vbCrLf & u.Brief & vbCrLf & "?", vbYesNo + vbQuestion, "Внимание") = vbYes Then on error goto bye u.Parent.Delete u.ID on error resume next Dim rnode As MSComctlLib.Node, tid as string Set rnode = treeGENPACKAGE.SelectedItem If rnode.Tag = "Row" Then Set rnode = rnode.parent End If While rnode.Children > 0 treeGENPACKAGE.Nodes.Remove rnode.Child.Key Wend tid = CreateGUID2() treeGENPACKAGE.Nodes.Add(rnode.Key, 4, tid, "Expanding...").Tag = "ToDelete" treeGENPACKAGE_Expand treeGENPACKAGE.Nodes.Item(rnode.Key) Else Cancel = True End If End If Exit Sub bye: Cancel = True MsgBox Err.Description, vbOKOnly + vbExclamation, "Удаление" End Sub
Private Sub gridGENPACKAGE_DblClick() on error resume next If gridGENPACKAGE.ItemCount = 0 Then Exit Sub If gridGENPACKAGE.Row > 0 Then If gridGENPACKAGE.RowIndex ( gridGENPACKAGE.Row) > 0 Then Dim u As Object Dim bm bm = gridGENPACKAGE.RowBookmark(gridGENPACKAGE.RowIndex(gridGENPACKAGE.Row)) Set u = Item.FindRowObject(Right(bm, len(bm)-38), Left(bm, 38)) Dim frm As Form Set frm = FormByName(TypeName(u),"") Set frm.Item = u again: frm.NotFirstTime = False frm.OnInit frm.Show vbModal If frm.OK Then on error goto bye u.save u.Brief true bye: if err.number <>0 then msgbox err.description,vbokonly+vbExclamation,"Изменение" on error resume next goto again end if on error resume next gridGENPACKAGE.RefreshRowBookmark bm Else u.Refresh End If Set frm = Nothing End If End If End Sub

38), Left(bm, 38)) SaveToBuffer u End If End If End Sub Private Sub mnuGENPACKAGECUT_Click() On Error Resume Next If gridGENPACKAGE.ItemCount = 0 Then Exit Sub If gridGENPACKAGE.Row > 0 Then If gridGENPACKAGE.RowIndex(gridGENPACKAGE.Row) > 0 Then Dim u As Object Dim bm bm = gridGENPACKAGE.RowBookmark(gridGENPACKAGE.RowIndex(gridGENPACKAGE.Row)) Set u = item.FindRowObject(Right(bm, Len(bm) - 38), Left(bm, 38)) SaveToBuffer u SET BM = u.parent u.parent.Delete u.ID gridGENPACKAGE.ITEMCOUNT = BM.COUNT End If End If End Sub private sub mnuGENPACKAGEPASTE_Click() on error resume next Dim p As Object, ID As String, struct As String, u As Object If treeGENPACKAGE.SelectedItem Is Nothing Then Exit Sub If treeGENPACKAGE.SelectedItem.Tag = "Row" Then On Error Resume Next ID = Mid(treeGENPACKAGE.SelectedItem.key, 39, 38) struct = treeGENPACKAGE.SelectedItem.parent.tag Set p = Item.FindRowObject(struct, ID) If Item.itemcollection(p, TypeName(p)) Is Nothing Then Set u = p.Parent.Add Else Set u = Item.itemcollection(p, TypeName(p)).Add End If
Set p = Nothing ElseIf treeGENPACKAGE.SelectedItem.Tag <> "object" Then If treeGENPACKAGE.SelectedItem.Parent.Tag = "Row" Then ID = Mid(treeGENPACKAGE.SelectedItem.Parent.key, 39, 38) struct = treeGENPACKAGE.SelectedItem.parent.parent.tag Set p = Item.FindRowObject(struct, ID) Set u = Item.itemcollection(p, treeGENPACKAGE.SelectedItem.Tag).Add End If If treeGENPACKAGE.SelectedItem.Parent.Tag = "object" Then ID = Mid(treeGENPACKAGE.SelectedItem.Parent.key, 39, 38) Set p = Item.Manager.GetInstanceObject(ID) Set u = Item.itemcollection(p, treeGENPACKAGE.SelectedItem.Tag).Add End If End If Set p = Nothing If u Is Nothing Then Exit Sub if getFrombuffer(u) then gridGENPACKAGE.ItemCount = u.Parent.Count gridGENPACKAGE.Refresh gridGENPACKAGE.RefreshGroups gridGENPACKAGE.RefreshSort Dim tid As String Dim key As String on error resume next Dim rnode As MSComctlLib.Node Set rnode = treeGENPACKAGE.SelectedItem If rnode.Tag = "Row" Then Set rnode = rnode.parent End If While rnode.Children > 0 treeGENPACKAGE.Nodes.Remove rnode.Child.Key Wend tid = CreateGUID2() treeGENPACKAGE.Nodes.Add(rnode.Key, 4, tid, "Expanding...").Tag = "ToDelete" treeGENPACKAGE_Expand treeGENPACKAGE.Nodes.Item(rnode.Key) Else u.Parent.Remove u.ID End If End Sub
Private Sub mnuGENPACKAGECHANGE_Click() On Error Resume Next If gridGENPACKAGE.ItemCount = 0 Then Exit Sub If gridGENPACKAGE.Row > 0 Then If gridGENPACKAGE.RowIndex(gridGENPACKAGE.Row) > 0 Then Dim u As Object Dim bm bm = gridGENPACKAGE.RowBookmark(gridGENPACKAGE.RowIndex(gridGENPACKAGE.Row)) Set u = item.FindRowObject(Right(bm, Len(bm) - 38), Left(bm, 38)) If GetFromBuffer(u) Then gridGENPACKAGE.ItemCount = u.parent.Count gridGENPACKAGE.RefreshRowIndex gridGENPACKAGE.RowIndex(gridGENPACKAGE.Row) End If End If End If End Sub Private Sub mnuGENPACKAGECLEAN_Click() item.Manager.ClearBuffer " & p.name & " End Sub private sub mnuGENPACKAGEPrn_click() menuActionGENPACKAGE ="PRN" menuTimerGENPACKAGE.enabled = true end sub private sub mnuGENPACKAGECfg_click() menuActionGENPACKAGE ="CFG" menuTimerGENPACKAGE.enabled = true end sub private sub mnuGENPACKAGEFind_click() menuActionGENPACKAGE ="FND" menuTimerGENPACKAGE.enabled = true end sub private sub mnuGENPACKAGEAcc_click() menuActionGENPACKAGE ="ACC" menuTimerGENPACKAGE.enabled = true end sub private sub menuTimerGENPACKAGE_timer() menuTimerGENPACKAGE.enabled = false if menuActionGENPACKAGE ="ADD" then cmdGENPACKAGEADD_CLick if menuActionGENPACKAGE ="EDIT" then cmdGENPACKAGEEDIT_CLick if menuActionGENPACKAGE ="DEL" then cmdGENPACKAGEDEL_CLick if menuActionGENPACKAGE ="RUN" then cmdGENPACKAGERUN_CLick if menuActionGENPACKAGE ="REF" then cmdGENPACKAGEREF_CLick if menuActionGENPACKAGE ="PRN" then cmdGENPACKAGEPRN_CLick if menuActionGENPACKAGE ="CFG" then cmdGENPACKAGECFG_CLick if menuActionGENPACKAGE ="FND" then cmdGENPACKAGEFND_CLick if menuActionGENPACKAGE ="ACC" then cmdGENPACKAGEACC_CLick menuActionGENPACKAGE ="" end sub

'Проверка наличия коллекции характеристик '{79E6BDEB-91D5-4B2E-81F7-3E091FB65E3A} private sub Run_VBCheckDescrs ( DesPartName as variant , optional RowItem as object ) On error resume next
On Error Resume Next
Dim part_col As Variant Dim part_item As Object Set part_col = CallByName(RowItem.Parent.Parent, DesPartName, VbGet, False) Set part_item = part_col.Item(1) If RowItem.Parent.Count = 1 Then If part_item.HasDescrs = -1 Then part_item.HasDescrs = 0 Else part_item.HasDescrs = -1 End If End If part_item.Save

'Apply security On Error GoTo bye If RowItem.Client Is Nothing Then Exit Sub If RowItem.Parent.Parent.AccessLevel Is Nothing Then Exit Sub RowItem.Client.Secure RowItem.Parent.Parent.AccessLevel.id RowItem.Client.propagate Exit Sub bye: MsgBox Err.Description, vbOKOnly + vbCritical, "Усановка стиля защиты" end sub
'Создание отчета из разных карточек '{5B8FB7B9-D8B1-4CA0-90AF-55F83D1A6E5D} private sub Run_VBMakeReport ( ReportType as variant , optional RowItem as object ) On error resume next
On error goto bye Dim ID As String Dim Obj As Object 'ID = CreateGUID2 'Call RowItem.Application.Manager.NewInstance(ID, "VRRPT", "Отчет " & Date) 'Set RowItem.Report = RowItem.Application.Manager.GetInstanceObject(ID) If RowItem.Report.VRRPT_MAIN.Count = 0 Then Set Obj = RowItem.Report.VRRPT_MAIN.Add Else Set Obj = RowItem.Report.VRRPT_MAIN.Item(1) End If
Set Obj.Author = RowItem.Application.FindRowObject("Users", Item.Application.MTZSession.GetSessionUserID()) Obj.TheDate = Date
If ReportType = "CLNT" Then Set Obj.Client = RowItem.Application End If If ReportType = "PRJ" Then Set Obj.Project = RowItem.Application End If If ReportType = "CONT" Then Set Obj.Contract = RowItem.Application End If If ReportType = "PERS" Then Set Obj.Person = RowItem.Application End If
Obj.Save RowItem.Save
Exit Sub bye: MsgBox Err.Description, vbOKOnly + vbCritical, "Создание отчета" end sub
' '{AA4085E6-745B-4A37-8EC4-65D99A653966} private sub Run_VBRemoveSymmetricObjRef ( ForwardFieldName as variant ,ObjTypeName as variant ,SymmetricPartName as variant ,SymmetricFieldName as variant , optional RowItem as object ) On error resume next
Dim OK As Boolean Dim ID As String Dim brief As String
On Error Resume Next ' On Error GoTo bye
Dim Obj As Object Dim part_col As Variant Dim part_item As Object Set Obj = CallByName(RowItem, ForwardFieldName, VbGet) Set part_col = CallByName(Obj, SymmetricPartName, VbGet, False) part_col.Filter = SymmetricFieldName + "='" + RowItem.Application.ID + "'" ' RowItem.Parent.Remove RowItem.ID Set part_item = part_col.Item(1) part_col.Delete part_item.ID Exit Sub bye: Resume
end sub
'Создать новую оплату из клиента '{42A1A436-8AA2-4F1F-999B-6680DFF514DE} private sub Run_VBNewPayIn ( optional RowItem as object ) On error resume next
On error goto bye Dim ID As String Dim Obj As Object ID = CreateGUID2 Call RowItem.Application.Manager.NewInstance(ID, "PEKP", "Платеж " & Date) Set RowItem.TheDocument = RowItem.Application.Manager.GetInstanceObject(ID)
If RowItem.TheDocument.PEKP_DEF.Count = 0 Then Set Obj = RowItem.TheDocument.PEKP_DEF.Add Else Set Obj = RowItem.TheDocument.PEKP_DEF.Item(1) End If
Set Obj.FromClient = RowItem.Application Obj.PLPDate = Date Obj.Save RowItem.Save
Exit Sub bye: MsgBox Err.Description, vbOKOnly + vbCritical, "Создание Платежа" end sub
'Для раздела, в котором есть поле - ссылка, создает/выбирает объект без открытия окна редактирования ссылки '{A2EEE876-54D8-4AED-B124-775F5DA2D911} private sub Run_VBAddObjByRef ( ObjTypeName as variant ,ForwardFieldName as variant ,SymmetricPartName as variant ,SymmetricFieldName as variant , optional RowItem as object ) On error resume next
Dim OK As Boolean Dim ID As String Dim brief As String Dim Mode As String Dim ResObject as Object On Error Resume Next Mode = Mid(TypeName(Me), InStr(TypeName(Me), "_") + 1)
' On Error GoTo bye If Len(Mode) = 0 Then OK = Item.Application.Manager.GetObjectListDialogEx(ID, brief, "", ObjTypeName) Else ID = CreateGUID2 If Len(ObjTypeName) = 0 Then Dim newObj As Object Set newObj = Item.Application.Manager.GetNewObject If Not (newObj Is Nothing) Then OK = True ID = newObj.ID End If Else OK = Item.Application.Manager.NewInstance(ID, ObjTypeName, "") End If Dim ref As Object, objGui As Object Set ref = Item.Application.Manager.GetInstanceObject(ID) If Not ref Is Nothing Then Set objGui = Item.Application.Manager.GetInstanceGUI(ID) If objGui Is Nothing Then Set ref = Nothing: Exit Sub objGui.Show "", ref, False Set objGui = Nothing Else OK = False End If End If Dim Obj As Object Set Obj = Item.Application.Manager.GetInstanceObject(ID) If Obj Is Nothing Then OK = False End If If OK Then Dim Coll as New Collection Dim part_col As Variant Dim part_item As Object CallByName RowItem, ForwardFieldName, VbSet, Obj Coll.Add TypeName(RowItem)+ ":" + RowItem.ID RowItem.Save If Len(SymmetricPartName) > 0 And Len(SymmetricFieldName) > 0 Then Set part_col = CallByName(Obj, SymmetricPartName, VbGet, True) Set part_item = part_col.Add CallByName part_item, SymmetricFieldName, VbSet, RowItem.Application part_item.Save Coll.Add SymmetricPartName + ":" + part_item.ID End If Call Item.Application.Manager.AddCustomObjects(Coll, Obj.ID) Else RowItem.Parent.Remove RowItem.ID End If Exit Sub bye: Resume end sub
' '{5B376AF5-339B-4365-BA80-785E28BCF4DA} private sub Run_VBUpdateSymmetricObjRef ( SymmetricFieldName as variant ,ForwardFieldName as variant ,SymmetricPartName as variant ,ObjTypeName as variant , optional RowItem as object ) On error resume next
end sub
'Создать новый платеж из клиента '{2BB30818-90ED-4627-8ABB-85B3FBA46750} private sub Run_VBNewPayOut ( optional RowItem as object ) On error resume next
On error goto bye Dim ID As String Dim Obj As Object ID = CreateGUID2 Call RowItem.Application.Manager.NewInstance(ID, "PEKO", "Оплата " & Date) Set RowItem.TheDocument = RowItem.Application.Manager.GetInstanceObject(ID)
If RowItem.TheDocument.PEKO_DEF.Count = 0 Then Set Obj = RowItem.TheDocument.PEKO_DEF.Add Else Set Obj = RowItem.TheDocument.PEKO_DEF.Item(1) End If
Set Obj.ToClient = RowItem.Application Obj.PLPDate = Date Obj.Save RowItem.Save
Exit Sub bye: MsgBox Err.Description, vbOKOnly + vbCritical, "Создание Платежа" end sub
'открытие карточки по идентификатору '{94E8F6DB-106A-44DC-9483-86C801798FF0} private sub Run_VBOpenRef ( StartMode as variant ,ID as variant , optional RowItem as object ) On error resume next
on error resume next If ID <> "" Then Dim Obj As Object Set Obj = item.Manager.GetInstanceObject(ID) If Not Obj Is Nothing Then Dim objGui As Object Set objGui = item.Manager.GetInstanceGUI(Obj.ID) If objGui Is Nothing Then Exit Sub
If StartMode = "AUTO" Then StartMode = "" dim i as long For i = 100 To 0 Step -10 If Obj.MTZSession.CheckRight(Obj.SecureStyleid, Obj.TypeName & ":" & "M" & i) Then StartMode = "M" & i Exit For End If Next End If
objGui.Show StartMode & "", Obj Set objGui = Nothing End If End If
end sub

'Метод создает новый элемент в иерархии Имущественных Комплексов (приложение RealEstate) при создании нового элемента к нему линкуется объект ИК, форма которого и вызывается на редактирование '{477B8D25-4FF7-491A-A0B0-D3437EC16957} private sub Run_MakeNewFolderEC ( FolderID as variant , optional RowItem as object ) On error resume next
On Error GoTo bye Dim ID As String Dim Obj As Object ' EstComplex.Application ' Object Dim GObj As Object Dim fold As Object 'EstCatalog.Application ' Object
ID = CreateGUID2 Call RowItem.Application.Manager.NewInstance(ID, "EstComplex", RowItem.TheName & " " & Date) Set Obj = RowItem.Application.Manager.GetInstanceObject(ID) If Obj.EC_Def.Count = 0 Then With Obj.EC_Def.Add .TheName = RowItem.TheName End With Else Obj.EC_Def.Item(1).TheName = RowItem.TheName End If Obj.Save Set RowItem.LinkedEC = Obj RowItem.Save Set GObj = RowItem.Application.Manager.GetInstanceGUI(Obj.ID) GObj.Show "", Obj, True 'False Set Obj = RowItem.Application.Manager.GetInstanceObject(ID) RowItem.TheName = Obj.EC_Def.Item(1).TheName RowItem.Save Exit Sub bye: MsgBox Err.Description, vbOKOnly + vbCritical, "Создание ИК"
end sub

If RowItem.TheDocument.PEKO_DEF.Count = 0 Then Set Obj = RowItem.TheDocument.PEKz_DEF.Add Else Set Obj = RowItem.TheDocument.PEKZ_DEF.Item(1) End If

Exit Sub bye: MsgBox Err.Description, vbOKOnly + vbCritical, "Создание Заявки" end sub

Private Sub cmdLocalizeInfoRef_Click() on error resume next item.LocalizeInfo.Refresh gridLocalizeInfo.itemCount = item.LocalizeInfo.count gridLocalizeInfo.Refetch gridLocalizeInfo.Refresh End Sub Private Sub cmdLocalizeInfoAcc_Click() On Error Resume Next If gridLocalizeInfo.ItemCount = 0 Then Exit Sub If gridLocalizeInfo.Row > 0 Then If gridLocalizeInfo.RowIndex(gridLocalizeInfo.Row) > 0 Then Dim u As Object Dim bm bm = gridLocalizeInfo.RowBookmark(gridLocalizeInfo.RowIndex(gridLocalizeInfo.Row)) Set u = Item.FindRowObject(Right(bm, Len(bm) - 38), Left(bm, 38)) Item.Application.Manager.ShowSecurityDialog u End If End If End Sub Private Sub cmdLocalizeInfoEdit_Click() on error resume next If gridLocalizeInfo.ItemCount = 0 Then Exit Sub If gridLocalizeInfo.Row > 0 then If gridLocalizeInfo.RowIndex(gridLocalizeInfo.Row ) > 0 Then Dim u As Object Dim bm bm = gridLocalizeInfo.RowBookmark(gridLocalizeInfo.RowIndex(gridLocalizeInfo.Row)) Set u = Item.FindRowObject(Right(bm, len(bm)-38), Left(bm, 38)) Set frmLocalizeInfo_.Item = u again: frmLocalizeInfo_.NotFirstTime = False frmLocalizeInfo_.OnInit frmLocalizeInfo_.Show vbModal If frmLocalizeInfo_.OK Then on error resume next err.clear u.save if err.number <>0 then msgbox err.description,vbokonly+vbExclamation,"Изменение" goto again end if gridLocalizeInfo.RefreshRowBookmark bm else u.refresh End If End If End If End Sub Private Sub cmdLocalizeInfoDel_Click() on error resume next gridLocalizeInfo.Delete End Sub Private Sub cmdLocalizeInfoAdd_Click() on error resume next Dim u As Object Set u = Item.LocalizeInfo.Add()
Set frmLocalizeInfo_.Item = u again: frmLocalizeInfo_.NotFirstTime = False frmLocalizeInfo_.OnInit frmLocalizeInfo_.Show vbModal If frmLocalizeInfo_.OK Then err.clear u.save if err.number <>0 then msgbox err.description,vbokonly+vbExclamation,"Создание" goto again end if gridLocalizeInfo.ItemCount = Item.LocalizeInfo.Count gridLocalizeInfo.Refresh gridLocalizeInfo.RefreshGroups gridLocalizeInfo.Refreshsort gridLocalizeInfo.MoveToBookmark u.ID & "LocalizeInfo" Else Item.LocalizeInfo.Delete u.ID Item.LocalizeInfo.Remove u.ID End If Exit Sub bye: MsgBox Err.Description,vbokonly+vbExclamation,"Создание" End Sub Private Sub cmdLocalizeInfoFnd_Click() on error resume next fndLocalizeInfo.ShowForm End Sub Private Sub cmdLocalizeInfoRun_Click() on error resume next gridLocalizeInfo_DblClick End Sub Public Function IsOK() as BooLEAN IsOK=TRUE End Function Private Sub gridLocalizeInfo_UnboundReadData(ByVal RowIndex As Long, ByVal Bookmark As Variant, ByVal Values As GridEX20.JSRowData) on error resume next Item.LocalizeInfo.LoadRow gridLocalizeInfo, RowIndex, Bookmark, Values End Sub Private Sub gridLocalizeInfo_BeforeDeleteEX(ByVal RowIndex As Long, ByVal Bookmark As Variant, ByVal Cancel As GridEX20.JSRetBoolean) If gridLocalizeInfo.ItemCount = 0 Then Exit Sub Dim u As Object Set u = Item.FindRowObject("LocalizeInfo", Left(Bookmark, 38)) If Not u Is Nothing Then on error resume next If MsgBox("Удалить элемент" & vbCrLf & u.Brief & vbcrlf & "?", vbYesNo + vbQuestion, "Внимание") = vbYes Then on error goto bye u.parent.Delete u.id Else Cancel = True End If End If Exit Sub bye: Cancel = True MsgBox Err.Description, vbOKOnly + vbExclamation, "Удаление" End Sub
Private Sub gridLocalizeInfo_DblClick() cmdLocalizeInfoEdit_Click End Sub Private Sub gridLocalizeInfo_KeyPress(KeyAscii As Integer) If gridLocalizeInfo.ItemCount = 0 Then Exit Sub On Error Resume Next fndLocalizeInfo.FindOnPress KeyAscii End Sub
Private Sub gridLocalizeInfo_RowColChange(ByVal LastRow As Long, ByVal LastCol As Integer) ON ERROR RESUME NEXT If LastRow <> gridLocalizeInfo.Row And LastRow > 0 Then gridLocalizeInfo.GetRowData(LastRow).RowStyle = "Default" gridLocalizeInfo.GetRowData(gridLocalizeInfo.Row).RowStyle = "SelectedRow" End If End Sub Private Sub mnuLocalizeInfoPASTE_Click() On Error Resume Next Dim u As Object Set u = item.LocalizeInfo.Add() If GetFromBuffer(u) Then gridLocalizeInfo.ItemCount = u.parent.Count End If End Sub 'Hidden GRID Setup... private sub gridLocalizeInfo_KeyDown(KeyCode As Integer, Shift As Integer) Dim ShiftDown, AltDown, CtrlDown ShiftDown = (Shift And vbShiftMask) > 0 AltDown = (Shift And vbAltMask) > 0 CtrlDown = (Shift And vbCtrlMask) > 0 If KeyCode = vbKeyF4 Then If ShiftDown And CtrlDown And AltDown Then cmdLocalizeInfoCfg_Click End If End If end sub
private sub gridLocalizeInfo_MouseDown(Button As Integer, Shift As Integer, X As Single, Y As Single) If Button = 2 And Shift = 0 Then on error resume next PopupMenu mnuPopupLocalizeInfo End If end sub private sub mnuLocalizeInfoAdd_click() menuActionLocalizeInfo ="ADD" menuTimerLocalizeInfo.enabled = true end sub private sub mnuLocalizeInfoEdit_click() menuActionLocalizeInfo ="EDIT" menuTimerLocalizeInfo.enabled = true end sub private sub mnuLocalizeInfoDelete_click() menuActionLocalizeInfo ="DEL" menuTimerLocalizeInfo.enabled = true end sub private sub mnuLocalizeInfoOpen_click() menuActionLocalizeInfo ="RUN" menuTimerLocalizeInfo.enabled = true end sub private sub mnuLocalizeInfoRef_click() menuActionLocalizeInfo ="REF" menuTimerLocalizeInfo.enabled = true end sub Private Sub mnuLocalizeInfoCOPY_Click() On Error Resume Next If gridLocalizeInfo.ItemCount = 0 Then Exit Sub If gridLocalizeInfo.Row > 0 Then If gridLocalizeInfo.RowIndex(gridLocalizeInfo.Row) > 0 Then Dim u As Object Dim bm bm = gridLocalizeInfo.RowBookmark(gridLocalizeInfo.RowIndex(gridLocalizeInfo.Row)) Set u = item.FindRowObject(Right(bm, Len(bm) - 38), Left(bm, 38)) SaveToBuffer u End If End If End Sub Private Sub mnuLocalizeInfoCUT_Click() On Error Resume Next If gridLocalizeInfo.ItemCount = 0 Then Exit Sub If gridLocalizeInfo.Row > 0 Then If gridLocalizeInfo.RowIndex(gridLocalizeInfo.Row) > 0 Then Dim u As Object Dim bm bm = gridLocalizeInfo.RowBookmark(gridLocalizeInfo.RowIndex(gridLocalizeInfo.Row)) Set u = item.FindRowObject(Right(bm, Len(bm) - 38), Left(bm, 38)) SaveToBuffer u SET BM = u.parent u.parent.Delete u.ID gridLocalizeInfo.ITEMCOUNT = BM.COUNT End If End If End Sub Private Sub mnuLocalizeInfoCHANGE_Click() On Error Resume Next If gridLocalizeInfo.ItemCount = 0 Then Exit Sub If gridLocalizeInfo.Row > 0 Then If gridLocalizeInfo.RowIndex(gridLocalizeInfo.Row) > 0 Then Dim u As Object Dim bm bm = gridLocalizeInfo.RowBookmark(gridLocalizeInfo.RowIndex(gridLocalizeInfo.Row)) Set u = item.FindRowObject(Right(bm, Len(bm) - 38), Left(bm, 38)) If GetFromBuffer(u) Then gridLocalizeInfo.ItemCount = u.parent.Count gridLocalizeInfo.RefreshRowIndex gridLocalizeInfo.RowIndex(gridLocalizeInfo.Row) End If End If End If End Sub Private Sub mnuLocalizeInfoCLEAN_Click() item.Manager.ClearBuffer " & p.name & " End Sub private sub mnuLocalizeInfoPrn_click() menuActionLocalizeInfo ="PRN" menuTimerLocalizeInfo.enabled = true end sub private sub mnuLocalizeInfoCfg_click() menuActionLocalizeInfo ="CFG" menuTimerLocalizeInfo.enabled = true end sub private sub mnuLocalizeInfoFind_click() menuActionLocalizeInfo ="FND" menuTimerLocalizeInfo.enabled = true end sub private sub mnuLocalizeInfoAcc_click() menuActionLocalizeInfo ="ACC" menuTimerLocalizeInfo.enabled = true end sub private sub menuTimerLocalizeInfo_timer() menuTimerLocalizeInfo.enabled = false if menuActionLocalizeInfo ="ADD" then cmdLocalizeInfoADD_CLick if menuActionLocalizeInfo ="EDIT" then cmdLocalizeInfoEDIT_CLick if menuActionLocalizeInfo ="DEL" then cmdLocalizeInfoDEL_CLick if menuActionLocalizeInfo ="RUN" then cmdLocalizeInfoRUN_CLick if menuActionLocalizeInfo ="REF" then cmdLocalizeInfoREF_CLick if menuActionLocalizeInfo ="PRN" then cmdLocalizeInfoPRN_CLick if menuActionLocalizeInfo ="CFG" then cmdLocalizeInfoCFG_CLick if menuActionLocalizeInfo ="FND" then cmdLocalizeInfoFND_CLick if menuActionLocalizeInfo ="ACC" then cmdLocalizeInfoACC_CLick menuActionLocalizeInfo ="" end sub

'do nothing end sub

on error resume next RowItem.Application.Name=name RowItem.Application.Save

'Передать права объекту контактное лицо от объекта клиент '{79DED4FD-045C-45F8-AC79-2E5A3D956D97} private sub Run_VBMigrateRight ( optional RowItem as object ) On error resume next
'Migrate security On Error GoTo bye If RowItem.Person Is Nothing Then Exit Sub
RowItem.Person.Secure Item.SecureStyleID RowItem.Person.propagate bye: Exit Sub MsgBox Err.Description, vbOKOnly + vbCritical, "Усановка стиля защиты" end sub
'Проверка наличия коллекции характеристик '{79E6BDEB-91D5-4B2E-81F7-3E091FB65E3A} private sub Run_VBCheckDescrs ( DesPartName as variant , optional RowItem as object ) On error resume next
On Error Resume Next
Dim part_col As Variant Dim part_item As Object Set part_col = CallByName(RowItem.Parent.Parent, DesPartName, VbGet, False) Set part_item = part_col.Item(1) If RowItem.Parent.Count = 1 Then If part_item.HasDescrs = -1 Then part_item.HasDescrs = 0 Else part_item.HasDescrs = -1 End If End If part_item.Save
end sub
'Применить стиль защиты для объекта Предназначен для каталога клиентов '{31EC6CF7-8DBD-4EFE-BF12-4D168F653D34} private sub Run_VBApplySecurity ( optional RowItem as object ) On error resume next
'Apply security On Error GoTo bye If RowItem.Client Is Nothing Then Exit Sub If RowItem.Parent.Parent.AccessLevel Is Nothing Then Exit Sub RowItem.Client.Secure RowItem.Parent.Parent.AccessLevel.id RowItem.Client.propagate Exit Sub bye: MsgBox Err.Description, vbOKOnly + vbCritical, "Усановка стиля защиты" end sub
'Создание отчета из разных карточек '{5B8FB7B9-D8B1-4CA0-90AF-55F83D1A6E5D} private sub Run_VBMakeReport ( ReportType as variant , optional RowItem as object ) On error resume next
On error goto bye Dim ID As String Dim Obj As Object 'ID = CreateGUID2 'Call RowItem.Application.Manager.NewInstance(ID, "VRRPT", "Отчет " & Date) 'Set RowItem.Report = RowItem.Application.Manager.GetInstanceObject(ID) If RowItem.Report.VRRPT_MAIN.Count = 0 Then Set Obj = RowItem.Report.VRRPT_MAIN.Add Else Set Obj = RowItem.Report.VRRPT_MAIN.Item(1) End If
Set Obj.Author = RowItem.Application.FindRowObject("Users", Item.Application.MTZSession.GetSessionUserID()) Obj.TheDate = Date
If ReportType = "CLNT" Then Set Obj.Client = RowItem.Application End If If ReportType = "PRJ" Then Set Obj.Project = RowItem.Application End If If ReportType = "CONT" Then Set Obj.Contract = RowItem.Application End If If ReportType = "PERS" Then Set Obj.Person = RowItem.Application End If
Obj.Save RowItem.Save
Exit Sub bye: MsgBox Err.Description, vbOKOnly + vbCritical, "Создание отчета" end sub
' '{AA4085E6-745B-4A37-8EC4-65D99A653966} private sub Run_VBRemoveSymmetricObjRef ( ForwardFieldName as variant ,ObjTypeName as variant ,SymmetricPartName as variant ,SymmetricFieldName as variant , optional RowItem as object ) On error resume next
Dim OK As Boolean Dim ID As String Dim brief As String
On Error Resume Next ' On Error GoTo bye
Dim Obj As Object Dim part_col As Variant Dim part_item As Object Set Obj = CallByName(RowItem, ForwardFieldName, VbGet) Set part_col = CallByName(Obj, SymmetricPartName, VbGet, False) part_col.Filter = SymmetricFieldName + "='" + RowItem.Application.ID + "'" ' RowItem.Parent.Remove RowItem.ID Set part_item = part_col.Item(1) part_col.Delete part_item.ID Exit Sub bye: Resume
end sub
'Создать новую оплату из клиента '{42A1A436-8AA2-4F1F-999B-6680DFF514DE} private sub Run_VBNewPayIn ( optional RowItem as object ) On error resume next
On error goto bye Dim ID As String Dim Obj As Object ID = CreateGUID2 Call RowItem.Application.Manager.NewInstance(ID, "PEKP", "Платеж " & Date) Set RowItem.TheDocument = RowItem.Application.Manager.GetInstanceObject(ID)
If RowItem.TheDocument.PEKP_DEF.Count = 0 Then Set Obj = RowItem.TheDocument.PEKP_DEF.Add Else Set Obj = RowItem.TheDocument.PEKP_DEF.Item(1) End If
Set Obj.FromClient = RowItem.Application Obj.PLPDate = Date Obj.Save RowItem.Save
Exit Sub bye: MsgBox Err.Description, vbOKOnly + vbCritical, "Создание Платежа" end sub
'Для раздела, в котором есть поле - ссылка, создает/выбирает объект без открытия окна редактирования ссылки '{A2EEE876-54D8-4AED-B124-775F5DA2D911} private sub Run_VBAddObjByRef ( ObjTypeName as variant ,ForwardFieldName as variant ,SymmetricPartName as variant ,SymmetricFieldName as variant , optional RowItem as object ) On error resume next
Dim OK As Boolean Dim ID As String Dim brief As String Dim Mode As String Dim ResObject as Object On Error Resume Next Mode = Mid(TypeName(Me), InStr(TypeName(Me), "_") + 1)
' On Error GoTo bye If Len(Mode) = 0 Then OK = Item.Application.Manager.GetObjectListDialogEx(ID, brief, "", ObjTypeName) Else ID = CreateGUID2 If Len(ObjTypeName) = 0 Then Dim newObj As Object Set newObj = Item.Application.Manager.GetNewObject If Not (newObj Is Nothing) Then OK = True ID = newObj.ID End If Else OK = Item.Application.Manager.NewInstance(ID, ObjTypeName, "") End If Dim ref As Object, objGui As Object Set ref = Item.Application.Manager.GetInstanceObject(ID) If Not ref Is Nothing Then Set objGui = Item.Application.Manager.GetInstanceGUI(ID) If objGui Is Nothing Then Set ref = Nothing: Exit Sub objGui.Show "", ref, False Set objGui = Nothing Else OK = False End If End If Dim Obj As Object Set Obj = Item.Application.Manager.GetInstanceObject(ID) If Obj Is Nothing Then OK = False End If If OK Then Dim Coll as New Collection Dim part_col As Variant Dim part_item As Object CallByName RowItem, ForwardFieldName, VbSet, Obj Coll.Add TypeName(RowItem)+ ":" + RowItem.ID RowItem.Save If Len(SymmetricPartName) > 0 And Len(SymmetricFieldName) > 0 Then Set part_col = CallByName(Obj, SymmetricPartName, VbGet, True) Set part_item = part_col.Add CallByName part_item, SymmetricFieldName, VbSet, RowItem.Application part_item.Save Coll.Add SymmetricPartName + ":" + part_item.ID End If Call Item.Application.Manager.AddCustomObjects(Coll, Obj.ID) Else RowItem.Parent.Remove RowItem.ID End If Exit Sub bye: Resume end sub
' '{5B376AF5-339B-4365-BA80-785E28BCF4DA} private sub Run_VBUpdateSymmetricObjRef ( SymmetricFieldName as variant ,ForwardFieldName as variant ,SymmetricPartName as variant ,ObjTypeName as variant , optional RowItem as object ) On error resume next
end sub
'Создать новый платеж из клиента '{2BB30818-90ED-4627-8ABB-85B3FBA46750} private sub Run_VBNewPayOut ( optional RowItem as object ) On error resume next
On error goto bye Dim ID As String Dim Obj As Object ID = CreateGUID2 Call RowItem.Application.Manager.NewInstance(ID, "PEKO", "Оплата " & Date) Set RowItem.TheDocument = RowItem.Application.Manager.GetInstanceObject(ID)
If RowItem.TheDocument.PEKO_DEF.Count = 0 Then Set Obj = RowItem.TheDocument.PEKO_DEF.Add Else Set Obj = RowItem.TheDocument.PEKO_DEF.Item(1) End If
Set Obj.ToClient = RowItem.Application Obj.PLPDate = Date Obj.Save RowItem.Save
Exit Sub bye: MsgBox Err.Description, vbOKOnly + vbCritical, "Создание Платежа" end sub
'открытие карточки по идентификатору '{94E8F6DB-106A-44DC-9483-86C801798FF0} private sub Run_VBOpenRef ( StartMode as variant ,ID as variant , optional RowItem as object ) On error resume next
on error resume next If ID <> "" Then Dim Obj As Object Set Obj = item.Manager.GetInstanceObject(ID) If Not Obj Is Nothing Then Dim objGui As Object Set objGui = item.Manager.GetInstanceGUI(Obj.ID) If objGui Is Nothing Then Exit Sub
If StartMode = "AUTO" Then StartMode = "" dim i as long For i = 100 To 0 Step -10 If Obj.MTZSession.CheckRight(Obj.SecureStyleid, Obj.TypeName & ":" & "M" & i) Then StartMode = "M" & i Exit For End If Next End If
objGui.Show StartMode & "", Obj Set objGui = Nothing End If End If
end sub

'Метод создает новый элемент в иерархии Имущественных Комплексов (приложение RealEstate) при создании нового элемента к нему линкуется объект ИК, форма которого и вызывается на редактирование '{477B8D25-4FF7-491A-A0B0-D3437EC16957} private sub Run_MakeNewFolderEC ( FolderID as variant , optional RowItem as object ) On error resume next
On Error GoTo bye Dim ID As String Dim Obj As Object ' EstComplex.Application ' Object Dim GObj As Object Dim fold As Object 'EstCatalog.Application ' Object
ID = CreateGUID2 Call RowItem.Application.Manager.NewInstance(ID, "EstComplex", RowItem.TheName & " " & Date) Set Obj = RowItem.Application.Manager.GetInstanceObject(ID) If Obj.EC_Def.Count = 0 Then With Obj.EC_Def.Add .TheName = RowItem.TheName End With Else Obj.EC_Def.Item(1).TheName = RowItem.TheName End If Obj.Save Set RowItem.LinkedEC = Obj RowItem.Save Set GObj = RowItem.Application.Manager.GetInstanceGUI(Obj.ID) GObj.Show "", Obj, True 'False Set Obj = RowItem.Application.Manager.GetInstanceObject(ID) RowItem.TheName = Obj.EC_Def.Item(1).TheName RowItem.Save Exit Sub bye: MsgBox Err.Description, vbOKOnly + vbCritical, "Создание ИК"
end sub
'Изменить название объекта '{4FB59D1A-0123-47D3-9F4F-E12085C5D074} private sub Run_VBUpdateItemName ( Name as variant , optional RowItem as object ) On error resume next
on error resume next item.name = Name ' может не быть формы, если используем просто ActiveX ParentForm.Caption = item.Name item.Save end sub

On error goto bye Dim ID As String Dim Obj As Object ID = CreateGUID2 Call RowItem.Application.Manager.NewInstance(ID, "PEKZ", "Заявка " & Date) Set RowItem.TheDocument = RowItem.Application.Manager.GetInstanceObject(ID)
If RowItem.TheDocument.PEKO_DEF.Count = 0 Then Set Obj = RowItem.TheDocument.PEKz_DEF.Add Else Set Obj = RowItem.TheDocument.PEKZ_DEF.Item(1) End If
Set Obj.ClientFrom = RowItem.Application Obj.QueryDate = Date Obj.Save RowItem.Save
Exit Sub bye: MsgBox Err.Description, vbOKOnly + vbCritical, "Создание Заявки" end sub

' Главный контрольный элемент для редактирования документа режим public Item as object public Host as GUI public ModalMode as boolean public ParentForm as object Private TSCustom As MTZ_CUSTOMTAB.TabStripCustomizer

'Получить нужную ширину контрола 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'Returns: ' значение типа Long 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as Long ' variable = me. PrefferedWidth Public Property Get PrefferedWidth() As Long PrefferedWidth = 0 End Property
'Задать нужную ширину контрола 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'Returns: ' значение типа Long 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as Long ' variable = me. PrefferedHeight Public Property Get PrefferedHeight() As Long PrefferedHeight = 0 End Property
Private Sub mnuSetup_Click() TSCustom.Setup ts End Sub Private Sub ts_MouseUp(Button As Integer, Shift As Integer, X As Single, Y As Single) If Button = 2 And Shift = 0 Then PopupMenu mnuCtl End If End Sub
'Все панели заполнены правильно 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'Returns: ' Boolean, семантика результата: ' true - ' false - 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as BooLEAN ' variable = me.IsOK() Public Function IsOK() as BooLEAN DIm IsItOk as Boolean IsItOk=True on error resume next if IsItOk then IsItOk = pnlMTZAPP.IsOK if IsItOk then IsItOk = pnlOBJECTTYPE.IsOK if IsItOk then IsItOk = pnlFIELDTYPE.IsOK if IsItOk then IsItOk = pnlSHAREDMETHOD.IsOK if IsItOk then IsItOk = pnlGENPACKAGE.IsOK if IsItOk then IsItOk = pnlLocalizeInfo.IsOK IsOK= IsItOk End Function private sub ts_click() on error resume next pnlLocalizeInfo.Visible = False pnlGENPACKAGE.Visible = False pnlSHAREDMETHOD.Visible = False pnlFIELDTYPE.Visible = False pnlOBJECTTYPE.Visible = False pnlMTZAPP.Visible = False
Select Case ts.SelectedItem.Key Case "MTZAPP" With pnlMTZAPP .Top = ts.ClientTop .Left = ts.ClientLeft .Width = ts.ClientWidth .Height = ts.ClientHeight .Visible = True .ZOrder 0 pnlMTZAPP.OnClick item,parentform End With Case "OBJECTTYPE" With pnlOBJECTTYPE .Top = ts.ClientTop .Left = ts.ClientLeft .Width = ts.ClientWidth .Height = ts.ClientHeight .Visible = True .ZOrder 0 pnlOBJECTTYPE.OnClick item,parentform End With Case "FIELDTYPE" With pnlFIELDTYPE .Top = ts.ClientTop .Left = ts.ClientLeft .Width = ts.ClientWidth .Height = ts.ClientHeight .Visible = True .ZOrder 0 pnlFIELDTYPE.OnClick item,parentform End With Case "SHAREDMETHOD" With pnlSHAREDMETHOD .Top = ts.ClientTop .Left = ts.ClientLeft .Width = ts.ClientWidth .Height = ts.ClientHeight .Visible = True .ZOrder 0 pnlSHAREDMETHOD.OnClick item,parentform End With Case "GENPACKAGE" With pnlGENPACKAGE .Top = ts.ClientTop .Left = ts.ClientLeft .Width = ts.ClientWidth .Height = ts.ClientHeight .Visible = True .ZOrder 0 pnlGENPACKAGE.OnClick item,parentform End With Case "LocalizeInfo" With pnlLocalizeInfo .Top = ts.ClientTop .Left = ts.ClientLeft .Width = ts.ClientWidth .Height = ts.ClientHeight .Visible = True .ZOrder 0 pnlLocalizeInfo.OnClick item,parentform End With End select end sub
'Инициализация контрола 'Parameters: '[IN][OUT] ObjItem , тип параметра: object, '[IN][OUT] MyHost , тип параметра: GUI, '[IN][OUT] aModalMode , тип параметра: boolean , '[IN][OUT] aParentForm , тип параметра: object - ... 'See Also: 'Example: ' call me.Init({параметры}) public sub Init( ObjItem as object, MyHost as GUI,aModalMode as boolean , aParentForm as object) on error resume next set Item = objItem set Host = myHost set ParentForm = aParentForm ModalMode = aModalMode Dim ff As Long, buf As String
ts.Tabs.Item(1).Caption = "Приложение" ts.Tabs.Item(1).key = "MTZAPP" pnlMTZAPP.OnInit item, parentForm call ts.Tabs.Add(, "OBJECTTYPE", "Тип объекта") pnlOBJECTTYPE.OnInit item, parentForm call ts.Tabs.Add(, "FIELDTYPE", "Тип поля") pnlFIELDTYPE.OnInit item, parentForm call ts.Tabs.Add(, "SHAREDMETHOD", "Методы и процедуры") pnlSHAREDMETHOD.OnInit item, parentForm call ts.Tabs.Add(, "GENPACKAGE", "Пакет генерации") pnlGENPACKAGE.OnInit item, parentForm call ts.Tabs.Add(, "LocalizeInfo", "Локализация") pnlLocalizeInfo.OnInit item, parentForm Set TSCustom = New MTZ_CUSTOMTAB.TabStripCustomizer TSCustom.Init ts, "MTZMetaModel", "ctl_main" TSCustom.SetupFromRegistry ts ts_click end sub Private Sub UserControl_Terminate() on error resume next set item=nothing Set Host = Nothing Set ParentForm = Nothing Set TSCustom = Nothing pnlMTZAPP.CloseClass pnlOBJECTTYPE.CloseClass pnlFIELDTYPE.CloseClass pnlSHAREDMETHOD.CloseClass pnlGENPACKAGE.CloseClass pnlLocalizeInfo.CloseClass End Sub
'Действие при сохранении 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'See Also: 'Example: ' call me.OnSave() public sub OnSave() pnlMTZAPP.OnSave pnlOBJECTTYPE.OnSave pnlFIELDTYPE.OnSave pnlSHAREDMETHOD.OnSave pnlGENPACKAGE.OnSave pnlLocalizeInfo.OnSave end sub
'Был ли изменен после открытия 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'Returns: ' Boolean, семантика результата: ' true - ' false - 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as boolean ' variable = me.IsChanged() public function IsChanged() as boolean dim m_IsChanged as boolean on error resume next m_IsChanged = m_IsChanged or pnlMTZAPP.IsChanged m_IsChanged = m_IsChanged or pnlOBJECTTYPE.IsChanged m_IsChanged = m_IsChanged or pnlFIELDTYPE.IsChanged m_IsChanged = m_IsChanged or pnlSHAREDMETHOD.IsChanged m_IsChanged = m_IsChanged or pnlGENPACKAGE.IsChanged m_IsChanged = m_IsChanged or pnlLocalizeInfo.IsChanged IsChanged = m_IsChanged end function private sub UserControl_Resize() on error resume next ts.Top = 0 ts.Left = 0 ts.Width = usercontrol.Width ts.Height = usercontrol.Height ts_Click end sub

'Создание отчета из разных карточек '{5B8FB7B9-D8B1-4CA0-90AF-55F83D1A6E5D} private sub Run_VBMakeReport ( ReportType as variant , optional RowItem as object ) On error resume next
On error goto bye Dim ID As String Dim Obj As Object 'ID = CreateGUID2 'Call RowItem.Application.Manager.NewInstance(ID, "VRRPT", "Отчет " & Date) 'Set RowItem.Report = RowItem.Application.Manager.GetInstanceObject(ID) If RowItem.Report.VRRPT_MAIN.Count = 0 Then Set Obj = RowItem.Report.VRRPT_MAIN.Add Else Set Obj = RowItem.Report.VRRPT_MAIN.Item(1) End If
Set Obj.Author = RowItem.Application.FindRowObject("Users", Item.Application.MTZSession.GetSessionUserID()) Obj.TheDate = Date
If ReportType = "CLNT" Then Set Obj.Client = RowItem.Application End If If ReportType = "PRJ" Then Set Obj.Project = RowItem.Application End If If ReportType = "CONT" Then Set Obj.Contract = RowItem.Application End If If ReportType = "PERS" Then Set Obj.Person = RowItem.Application End If
Obj.Save RowItem.Save
Exit Sub bye: MsgBox Err.Description, vbOKOnly + vbCritical, "Создание отчета" end sub
' '{AA4085E6-745B-4A37-8EC4-65D99A653966} private sub Run_VBRemoveSymmetricObjRef ( ForwardFieldName as variant ,ObjTypeName as variant ,SymmetricPartName as variant ,SymmetricFieldName as variant , optional RowItem as object ) On error resume next
Dim OK As Boolean Dim ID As String Dim brief As String
On Error Resume Next ' On Error GoTo bye
Dim Obj As Object Dim part_col As Variant Dim part_item As Object Set Obj = CallByName(RowItem, ForwardFieldName, VbGet) Set part_col = CallByName(Obj, SymmetricPartName, VbGet, False) part_col.Filter = SymmetricFieldName + "='" + RowItem.Application.ID + "'" ' RowItem.Parent.Remove RowItem.ID Set part_item = part_col.Item(1) part_col.Delete part_item.ID Exit Sub bye: Resume
end sub
'Создать новую оплату из клиента '{42A1A436-8AA2-4F1F-999B-6680DFF514DE} private sub Run_VBNewPayIn ( optional RowItem as object ) On error resume next
On error goto bye Dim ID As String Dim Obj As Object ID = CreateGUID2 Call RowItem.Application.Manager.NewInstance(ID, "PEKP", "Платеж " & Date) Set RowItem.TheDocument = RowItem.Application.Manager.GetInstanceObject(ID)
If RowItem.TheDocument.PEKP_DEF.Count = 0 Then Set Obj = RowItem.TheDocument.PEKP_DEF.Add Else Set Obj = RowItem.TheDocument.PEKP_DEF.Item(1) End If
Set Obj.FromClient = RowItem.Application Obj.PLPDate = Date Obj.Save RowItem.Save
Exit Sub bye: MsgBox Err.Description, vbOKOnly + vbCritical, "Создание Платежа" end sub
'Для раздела, в котором есть поле - ссылка, создает/выбирает объект без открытия окна редактирования ссылки '{A2EEE876-54D8-4AED-B124-775F5DA2D911} private sub Run_VBAddObjByRef ( ObjTypeName as variant ,ForwardFieldName as variant ,SymmetricPartName as variant ,SymmetricFieldName as variant , optional RowItem as object ) On error resume next
Dim OK As Boolean Dim ID As String Dim brief As String Dim Mode As String Dim ResObject as Object On Error Resume Next Mode = Mid(TypeName(Me), InStr(TypeName(Me), "_") + 1)
' On Error GoTo bye If Len(Mode) = 0 Then OK = Item.Application.Manager.GetObjectListDialogEx(ID, brief, "", ObjTypeName) Else ID = CreateGUID2 If Len(ObjTypeName) = 0 Then Dim newObj As Object Set newObj = Item.Application.Manager.GetNewObject If Not (newObj Is Nothing) Then OK = True ID = newObj.ID End If Else OK = Item.Application.Manager.NewInstance(ID, ObjTypeName, "") End If Dim ref As Object, objGui As Object Set ref = Item.Application.Manager.GetInstanceObject(ID) If Not ref Is Nothing Then Set objGui = Item.Application.Manager.GetInstanceGUI(ID) If objGui Is Nothing Then Set ref = Nothing: Exit Sub objGui.Show "", ref, False Set objGui = Nothing Else OK = False End If End If Dim Obj As Object Set Obj = Item.Application.Manager.GetInstanceObject(ID) If Obj Is Nothing Then OK = False End If If OK Then Dim Coll as New Collection Dim part_col As Variant Dim part_item As Object CallByName RowItem, ForwardFieldName, VbSet, Obj Coll.Add TypeName(RowItem)+ ":" + RowItem.ID RowItem.Save If Len(SymmetricPartName) > 0 And Len(SymmetricFieldName) > 0 Then Set part_col = CallByName(Obj, SymmetricPartName, VbGet, True) Set part_item = part_col.Add CallByName part_item, SymmetricFieldName, VbSet, RowItem.Application part_item.Save Coll.Add SymmetricPartName + ":" + part_item.ID End If Call Item.Application.Manager.AddCustomObjects(Coll, Obj.ID) Else RowItem.Parent.Remove RowItem.ID End If Exit Sub bye: Resume end sub

'открытие карточки по идентификатору '{94E8F6DB-106A-44DC-9483-86C801798FF0} private sub Run_VBOpenRef ( StartMode as variant ,ID as variant , optional RowItem as object ) On error resume next
on error resume next If ID <> "" Then Dim Obj As Object Set Obj = item.Manager.GetInstanceObject(ID) If Not Obj Is Nothing Then Dim objGui As Object Set objGui = item.Manager.GetInstanceGUI(Obj.ID) If objGui Is Nothing Then Exit Sub
If StartMode = "AUTO" Then StartMode = "" dim i as long For i = 100 To 0 Step -10 If Obj.MTZSession.CheckRight(Obj.SecureStyleid, Obj.TypeName & ":" & "M" & i) Then StartMode = "M" & i Exit For End If Next End If
objGui.Show StartMode & "", Obj Set objGui = Nothing End If End If
end sub

'Метод создает новый элемент в иерархии Имущественных Комплексов (приложение RealEstate) при создании нового элемента к нему линкуется объект ИК, форма которого и вызывается на редактирование '{477B8D25-4FF7-491A-A0B0-D3437EC16957} private sub Run_MakeNewFolderEC ( FolderID as variant , optional RowItem as object ) On error resume next
On Error GoTo bye Dim ID As String Dim Obj As Object ' EstComplex.Application ' Object Dim GObj As Object Dim fold As Object 'EstCatalog.Application ' Object
ID = CreateGUID2 Call RowItem.Application.Manager.NewInstance(ID, "EstComplex", RowItem.TheName & " " & Date) Set Obj = RowItem.Application.Manager.GetInstanceObject(ID) If Obj.EC_Def.Count = 0 Then With Obj.EC_Def.Add .TheName = RowItem.TheName End With Else Obj.EC_Def.Item(1).TheName = RowItem.TheName End If Obj.Save Set RowItem.LinkedEC = Obj RowItem.Save Set GObj = RowItem.Application.Manager.GetInstanceGUI(Obj.ID) GObj.Show "", Obj, True 'False Set Obj = RowItem.Application.Manager.GetInstanceObject(ID) RowItem.TheName = Obj.EC_Def.Item(1).TheName RowItem.Save Exit Sub bye: MsgBox Err.Description, vbOKOnly + vbCritical, "Создание ИК"
end sub
